name: Wobbuffet
flavorText:
It hates light and
shock. If attack­
ed, it inflates its body to pump
up its counter­
strike.

previous.name: Unown
previous.flavorText:
Their shapes look
like hieroglyphs
on ancient tab­ lets. It is said
that the two are
somehow related.
previous.formDescription: Forms only affect appearance.  A form is determined at random before a wild encounter and cannot be changed.

next.name: Girafarig
next.flavorText:
Its tail has a
small brain of its
own. Beware! If you get close, it
may react to your
scent and bite.

pokemon.name: Wynaut
pokemon.flavorText:
WYNAUT can always be seen with a big,
happy smile on its face. Look at its tail
to determine if it is angry. When angered, this POKéMON will be
slapping the ground with its tail.

It hates light and

ed, it inflates its body to pump
up its counter­
strike.
